item.title: DRIVE_LAYOUT_INFORMATION_EX 中的 PartitionCount 分区数量
item.author: xja
item.description: 微软文档中，结构体 DRIVE_LAYOUT_INFORMATION_EX 的定义如下 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 typedef struct _DRIVE_LAYOUT_INFORMATION_EX { DWORD PartitionStyle; DWORD PartitionCount; union { DRIVE_LAYOUT_INFORMATION_MBR Mbr; DRIVE_LAYOUT_INFORMATION_GPT Gpt; } DUMMYUNIONNAME; PARTITION_INFORMATION_EX PartitionEntry[1]; } DRIVE_LAYOUT_INFORMATION_EX, *PDRIVE_LAYOUT_INFORMATION_EX; 字段 PartitionCount 的描述为： The number of partitions on the drive. On hard disks with the MBR layout, this value will
